# Automation Status & Update Schedule

This document tracks which components update automatically and their update schedules.

## ‚úÖ Fully Automatic Components (Real-time Updates)

These components fetch data dynamically every time the README is viewed. No workflow needed.

### GitHub Stats & Metrics
- **GitHub Stats Card** (`github-readme-stats.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~5 minutes
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic
  
- **GitHub Streak Stats** (`streak-stats.demolab.com`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~15 minutes
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic

- **Top Languages Charts** (`github-readme-stats.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~5 minutes
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic

- **Profile Summary Cards** (`github-profile-summary-cards.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~10 minutes
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic

- **Activity Graph** (`github-readme-activity-graph.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~30 minutes
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic

- **GitHub Trophies** (`github-profile-trophy.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~1 hour
  - Dual Mode: ‚úÖ Automatic

- **Visitor Counter** (`komarev.com/ghpvc`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each unique visit
  - Dual Mode: N/A (badge only)

- **Dev Quotes** (`quotes-github-readme.vercel.app`)
  - Updates: Real-time on each page load
  - Caching: ~1 hour
  - Dual Mode: N/A

## üîÑ Scheduled Automatic Updates (GitHub Actions)

These components are generated by GitHub Actions workflows and update on schedule.

### 3D Contribution Graph
- **Workflow**: `.github/workflows/profile-3d.yml`
- **Schedule**: Daily at 00:00 UTC (midnight)
- **Manual Trigger**: ‚úÖ Available via workflow_dispatch
- **Files Generated**:
  - `profile-3d-contrib/profile-night-green.svg` (Dark mode)
  - `profile-3d-contrib/profile-green-animate.svg` (Light mode)
- **Dual Mode**: ‚úÖ Automatic via GitHub theme-aware syntax
- **Update Time**: ~2-5 minutes after midnight UTC

### Snake Animation
- **Workflow**: `.github/workflows/snake.yml`
- **Schedule**: Every 12 hours (00:00 and 12:00 UTC)
- **Manual Trigger**: ‚úÖ Available via workflow_dispatch
- **Files Generated**:
  - `github-contribution-grid-snake-dark.svg` (Dark mode)
  - `github-contribution-grid-snake.svg` (Light mode)
- **Dual Mode**: ‚úÖ Automatic via GitHub theme-aware syntax
- **Branch**: `output` (dedicated branch for generated files)
- **Update Time**: ~3-7 minutes after scheduled time

### Recent Activity
- **Workflow**: `.github/workflows/update-readme.yml`
- **Section**: `<!--START_SECTION:activity-->` to `<!--END_SECTION:activity-->`
- **Schedule**: Depends on workflow configuration
- **Manual Trigger**: ‚úÖ Available if configured
- **Dual Mode**: N/A (text-based)

## üîß Manual Trigger Instructions

### Option 1: GitHub Web Interface
1. Go to your repository on GitHub
2. Click **Actions** tab
3. Select the workflow (e.g., "Generate Snake" or "GitHub-Profile-3D-Contrib")
4. Click **Run workflow** button (top right)
5. Select branch (usually `main`)
6. Click **Run workflow** green button

### Option 2: GitHub CLI
```bash
# Trigger 3D contribution graph generation
gh workflow run "GitHub-Profile-3D-Contrib"

# Trigger snake animation generation
gh workflow run "Generate Snake"

# Check workflow status
gh run list --limit 5
```

### Option 3: API Request
```bash
# Trigger 3D contribution graph
curl -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: token YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN" \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/msrishav-28/msrishav-28/actions/workflows/profile-3d.yml/dispatches \
  -d '{"ref":"main"}'

# Trigger snake animation
curl -X POST \
  -H "Authorization: token YOUR_GITHUB_TOKEN" \
  -H "Accept: application/vnd.github.v3+json" \
  https://api.github.com/repos/msrishav-28/msrishav-28/actions/workflows/snake.yml/dispatches \
  -d '{"ref":"main"}'
```

## üé® Theme Switching Mechanism

### Automatic Theme Detection
All dual-mode components use one of these methods:

1. **GitHub's Native Theme-Aware Images** (3D Graph, Snake)
   ```markdown
   ![Image](./path/to/image-dark.svg#gh-dark-mode-only)
   ![Image](./path/to/image-light.svg#gh-light-mode-only)
   ```

2. **HTML Picture Element with Media Queries** (Stats, Charts)
   ```html
   <picture>
     <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: dark)" srcset="dark-url">
     <source media="(prefers-color-scheme: light)" srcset="light-url">
     <img src="default-url">
   </picture>
   ```

Both methods work automatically without JavaScript or user interaction.

## üêõ Troubleshooting

### Images Not Showing
1. **Clear browser cache** (Ctrl+Shift+R or Cmd+Shift+R)
2. **Check workflow status** in Actions tab
3. **Verify files exist** in repository
4. **Wait for cache** to expire (varies by component)

### Theme Not Switching
1. **Verify browser supports** `prefers-color-scheme`
2. **Check GitHub theme** setting (not system theme)
3. **Test in different browser**
4. **Clear cache and hard reload**

### Workflow Failures
1. **Check Actions tab** for error messages
2. **Verify repository permissions** (Settings ‚Üí Actions ‚Üí General)
3. **Check token permissions** (needs `contents: write`)
4. **Re-run failed workflow** manually

### Outdated Data
1. **API-based components**: Wait for cache to expire (5-60 minutes)
2. **Workflow-based components**: Trigger workflow manually
3. **If stuck**: Wait 24 hours for next automatic update

## üìà Performance & Caching

### Client-Side Caching
- Browser may cache images for 24 hours
- Use Ctrl+Shift+R for hard refresh

### Server-Side Caching
- GitHub CDN caches raw content
- Vercel APIs have built-in rate limiting
- Some APIs respect `cache-control` headers

### Best Practices
- Don't manually trigger workflows too frequently (respect rate limits)
- API-based components refresh automatically - no action needed
- Check Actions tab before manually triggering workflows
